name: Pocket Survivor
description:
- Follow the adventures of your wanderer through the "Event Log".
- Push the parameters that mostly match your style of play.
- Improve your equipment. Borrow to the maximum!
- Speculate the consumables, because on this you can make a round amount of bottle caps!
- Listen to the radio. - And most importantly - try not to die.
Good luck on the Wasteland!
